entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:55 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:55 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
